CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Closing_Date__c)),
IF( (Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 86400 < 60, TEXT(ROUND((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 1440 < 60, TEXT(FLOOR((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 1440)) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 24 < 24, TEXT(FLOOR((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 24)) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
TEXT(FLOOR((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate))) & " days " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 24, 24))) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Closing_Date__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds" ) ) ),
IF( (NOW() - CreatedDate) * 86400 < 60, TEXT(ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 86400, 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (NOW() - CreatedDate) * 1440 < 60, TEXT(FLOOR((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 1440)) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24 < 24, TEXT(FLOOR((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24)) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
TEXT(FLOOR((NOW() - CreatedDate))) & " days " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 24, 24))) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((NOW() - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Ticket Age
